value: A network of social interactions among university students within the Copenhagen Networks Study, over a period of four weeks, sampled every 5 minutes. Interactions include physical proximity (undirected), phone calls (directed, weighted), text messages (directed), and information about Facebook friendships (undirected). Nodes include some metadata, including gender.
['P. Sapiezynski, et al., \Interaction data from the Copenhagen Networks Study.\" Scientific Data 6
